{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.12994v1", "title": "Characterization of the $W_{1+\infty}$-n-algebra and applications", "summary": "In this paper, we construct the $W_{1+\infty}$-n-algebras in the framework of
the generalized quantum algebra. We characterize the
$\mathcal{R}(p,q)$-multi-variable $W_{1+\infty}$-algebra and derive its
$n$-algebra which is the generalized Lie algebra for $n$ even. Furthermore, we
investigate the $\mathcal{R}(p,q)$-elliptic hermitian matrix model and
determine a toy model for the generalized quantum $W_{\infty}$ constraints.
Also, we deduce particular cases of our results.", "main_category": "math-ph", "categories": "math-ph,math.MP", "published": "2025-04-17T15:02:43Z"}
